nodes.title: Example Texts
nodes.body:
• Ltung bshags kyi cho ga ‘grel pa dang bcas pa 
  • Bde gshegs sum cu so lnga’i ltung bshags cho ga
  • See also: Byang chub ltung bshags = Mahāyāna sūtra for confessions of downfalls; Mna’ bshags = Mahāyāna Buddhist formula for confession and atonement; Phung po gsum pa’i mdo = The Sūtra of the Three Heaps
